properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 8:30PM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lincoln IL
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Illinois...

Sangamon River at Monticello affecting Piatt County
Sangamon River near Oakford affecting Cass...Mason and Menard
Counties
Sangamon River near Chandlerville affecting Cass and Mason Counties

.The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil
moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Sangamon River at Monticello.
* From late tonight until Thursday morning.
* At 8 PM Saturday the stage was 12.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 13 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by early tomorrow morning and
continue to rise to near 14.6 feet by Monday afternoon.The river
will fall below flood stage by early Thursday morning.
* Impact...At 13 feet...Flooding of agricultural areas begins.
properties.instruction:
If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternate
route. Turn around, don't drown.

Additional river and weather information is available at
www.weather.gov/ilx.
